entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Attawapiskat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:22 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -32.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Attawapiskat Airport 9:00 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -32.7°C
Pressure: 101.4 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 72 %

Dewpoint: -36.0°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 32. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow overnight. Snow beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 44 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: Snow ending after midnight then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 28 in the evening and minus 48 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
